snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. Goodbye dear friend, we will always miss you and our sincerest condolences to Florence and the family. Love, Marilyn Rush and Arnold Sollar, Bernice and Leonard Adell, Leslie and Bernard Ettinger, and Grace Horowitz 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. Goodbye dear friend, we will always miss you and our sincerest condolences to Florence and the family. Love, Marilyn Rush and Arnold Sollar, Bernice and Leonard Adell, Leslie and Bernard Ettinger, and Grace Horowitz 1/3
